title: Over the Isen (4U31)
text:
Set:	The Two Towers
Kind:	Shadow
Culture:	Dunland
Twilight:	0
Card Type:	Condition
Game Text:	Plays to your support area. Assignment: Spot a site you control and remove (2) to assign a [Dunland] Man to an unbound companion.
Lore:	Like their ancestors years before, the Dunlendings came down from Isengard.
Rarity:	U
